html: (2 Nephi 26:18)."The multitude of their terrible ones shall be as chaff." The wicked shall be tossed to the wind as chaff that is separated from the good seed at harvest time. This could apply to the wicked in the latter days who oppose the Lord's standard of Zion, or it could have application to the past destruction of the wicked Nephite society: they who were "led about by Satan, even as chaff is driven before the wind." (Mormon 5:16-18.)
